item.title: Range Dmg
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

here ill give you my melee max hits and my ranged max hits…

	public void CalculateMaxHit() {
		double MaxHit = 0; 
		int StrBonus = playerBonus[10];
		double E = 1 + StrBonus / 150 + (StrBonus*(Math.log(Strength))) / 300;
		if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] > 0) {
		if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		} else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		} else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		}
		} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] < 1) {
		if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		} else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		} else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		}
		}
		if(FullDharokEquipped())
                {
		MaxHit += (getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]) - playerLevel[playerHitpoints])/2;
                }
		if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 6577 && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6523 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6525 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6527 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6528 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6526)) {
			playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit*1.2);
		}
		if (usingSpecial && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7645)) {
			playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit*1.1);
		} else if (usingSpecial && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7647)) {
			playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit*1.15);
		} else if (usingSpecial && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434) {
			playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit*1.45);
		} else if (usingSpecial && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) {
			playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit*1.1);
		} else if (usingSpecial && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3121) {
			playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit*1.1);
		} else if (usingSpecial && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7652) {
			playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit*1.25);
		} else if (usingSpecial && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7622) {
			playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit*1.1);
		} else {
		playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);
		}
	}
	public void CalculateRangeMaxHit() {
		double MaxHitRanged = 0;
		//Bronze Arrows\\
		if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4734) {
			if(playerLevel[4] <= 2) {
		MaxHitRanged += 1;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 3 && playerLevel[4] <= 11) {
		MaxHitRanged += 2;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 12 && playerLevel[4] <= 20) {
		MaxHitRanged += 3;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 21 && playerLevel[4] <= 29) {
		MaxHitRanged += 4;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 30 && playerLevel[4] <= 38) {
		MaxHitRanged += 5;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 39 && playerLevel[4] <= 47) {
		MaxHitRanged += 6;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 48 && playerLevel[4] <= 56) {
		MaxHitRanged += 7;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 57 && playerLevel[4] <= 65) {
		MaxHitRanged += 8;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 66 && playerLevel[4] <= 74) {
		MaxHitRanged += 9;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 75 && playerLevel[4] <= 83) {
		MaxHitRanged += 10;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 84 && playerLevel[4] <= 92) {
		MaxHitRanged += 11;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 93 && playerLevel[4] <= 101) {
		MaxHitRanged += 12;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 102 && playerLevel[4] <= 110) {
		MaxHitRanged += 13;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 111 && playerLevel[4] <= 119) {
		MaxHitRanged += 14;
			}
		}
		//End of Bronze Arrows\\
		//Iron Arrows\\
		if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4734) {
			if(playerLevel[4] <= 1) {
		MaxHitRanged += 1;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 2 && playerLevel[4] <= 10) {
		MaxHitRanged += 2;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 11 && playerLevel[4] <= 19) {
		MaxHitRanged += 3;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 20 && playerLevel[4] <= 28) {
		MaxHitRanged += 4;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 29 && playerLevel[4] <= 37) {
		MaxHitRanged += 5;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 38 && playerLevel[4] <= 46) {
		MaxHitRanged += 6;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 47 && playerLevel[4] <= 55) {
		MaxHitRanged += 7;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 56 && playerLevel[4] <= 64) {
		MaxHitRanged += 8;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 65 && playerLevel[4] <= 73) {
		MaxHitRanged += 9;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 74 && playerLevel[4] <= 82) {
		MaxHitRanged += 10;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 83 && playerLevel[4] <= 91) {
		MaxHitRanged += 11;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 92 && playerLevel[4] <= 100) {
		MaxHitRanged += 12;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 101 && playerLevel[4] <= 109) {
		MaxHitRanged += 13;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 110 && playerLevel[4] <= 118) {
		MaxHitRanged += 14;
			}
		}
		//End of Iron Arrows\\
		//Steel Arrows\\
		if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4734) {
			if(playerLevel[4] <= 5) {
		MaxHitRanged += 1;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 5 && playerLevel[4] <= 8) {
		MaxHitRanged += 2;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 9 && playerLevel[4] <= 16) {
		MaxHitRanged += 3;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 17 && playerLevel[4] <= 24) {
		MaxHitRanged += 4;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 25 && playerLevel[4] <= 32) {
		MaxHitRanged += 5;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 33 && playerLevel[4] <= 40) {
		MaxHitRanged += 6;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 41 && playerLevel[4] <= 48) {
		MaxHitRanged += 7;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 49 && playerLevel[4] <= 56) {
		MaxHitRanged += 8;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 57 && playerLevel[4] <= 64) {
		MaxHitRanged += 9;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 65 && playerLevel[4] <= 72) {
		MaxHitRanged += 10;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 73 && playerLevel[4] <= 80) {
		MaxHitRanged += 11;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 81 && playerLevel[4] <= 88) {
		MaxHitRanged += 12;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 89 && playerLevel[4] <= 96) {
		MaxHitRanged += 13;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 97) {
		MaxHitRanged += 14;
			}
		}
		//End of Steel Arrows\\
		//Mith Arrows\\
		if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4734) {
			if(playerLevel[4] <= 19) {
		MaxHitRanged += 3;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 20 && playerLevel[4] <= 23) {
		MaxHitRanged += 4;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 24 && playerLevel[4] <= 30) {
		MaxHitRanged += 5;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 31 && playerLevel[4] <= 38) {
		MaxHitRanged += 6;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 39 && playerLevel[4] <= 45) {
		MaxHitRanged += 7;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 46 && playerLevel[4] <= 53) {
		MaxHitRanged += 8;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 54 && playerLevel[4] <= 60) {
		MaxHitRanged += 9;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 61 && playerLevel[4] <= 68) {
		MaxHitRanged += 10;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 69 && playerLevel[4] <= 75) {
		MaxHitRanged += 11;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 76 && playerLevel[4] <= 82) {
		MaxHitRanged += 12;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 83 && playerLevel[4] <= 90) {
		MaxHitRanged += 13;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 91 && playerLevel[4] <= 98) {
		MaxHitRanged += 14;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 99 && playerLevel[4] <= 100) {
		MaxHitRanged += 15;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 101) {
		MaxHitRanged += 16;
			}
		}
		//End of Mith Arrows\\
		//Addy Arrows\\
		if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4734) {
			if(playerLevel[4] <= 29) {
		MaxHitRanged += 5;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 30 && playerLevel[4] <= 31) {
		MaxHitRanged += 6;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 32 && playerLevel[4] <= 38) {
		MaxHitRanged += 7;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 39 && playerLevel[4] <= 45) {
		MaxHitRanged += 8;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 46 && playerLevel[4] <= 52) {
		MaxHitRanged += 9;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 53 && playerLevel[4] <= 59) {
		MaxHitRanged += 10;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 60 && playerLevel[4] <= 66) {
		MaxHitRanged += 11;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 67 && playerLevel[4] <= 73) {
		MaxHitRanged += 12;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 74 && playerLevel[4] <= 80) {
		MaxHitRanged += 13;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 81 && playerLevel[4] <= 87) {
		MaxHitRanged += 14;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 88 && playerLevel[4] <= 94) {
		MaxHitRanged += 15;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 95 && playerLevel[4] <= 100) {
		MaxHitRanged += 16;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 101) {
		MaxHitRanged += 17;
			}
		}
		//End of Addy Arrows\\
		//Rune Arrows\\
		if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4734) {
			if(playerLevel[4] <= 39) {
		MaxHitRanged += 8;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 40 && playerLevel[4] < 41) {
		MaxHitRanged += 9;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 41 && playerLevel[4] <= 46) {
		MaxHitRanged += 10;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 47 && playerLevel[4] <= 53) {
		MaxHitRanged += 11;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 54 && playerLevel[4] <= 58) {
		MaxHitRanged += 12;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 59 && playerLevel[4] <= 64) {
		MaxHitRanged += 13;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 65 && playerLevel[4] <= 70) {
		MaxHitRanged += 14;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 71 && playerLevel[4] <= 76) {
		MaxHitRanged += 15;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 77 && playerLevel[4] <= 82) {
		MaxHitRanged += 16;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 83 && playerLevel[4] <= 88) {
		MaxHitRanged += 17;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 89 && playerLevel[4] <= 94) {
		MaxHitRanged += 18;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 95 && playerLevel[4] <= 100) {
		MaxHitRanged += 19;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 101) {
		MaxHitRanged += 20;
			}
		}
		//End of Rune Arrows\\
		//Other Bows\\
		if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) { //cbow
			if (playerLevel[4] >= 70 && playerLevel[4] <= 76) {
		MaxHitRanged += 17;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 77 && playerLevel[4] <= 82) {
		MaxHitRanged += 18;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 83 && playerLevel[4] <= 88) {
		MaxHitRanged += 19;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 89 && playerLevel[4] <= 94) {
		MaxHitRanged += 20;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 95 && playerLevel[4] <= 100) {
		MaxHitRanged += 21;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 101) {
		MaxHitRanged += 22;
		}
		} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4740) { //xbow
			if (playerLevel[4] >= 70 && playerLevel[4] <= 76) {
		MaxHitRanged += 13;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 77 && playerLevel[4] <= 82) {
		MaxHitRanged += 14;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 83 && playerLevel[4] <= 88) {
		MaxHitRanged += 15;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 89 && playerLevel[4] <= 94) {
		MaxHitRanged += 16;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 95 && playerLevel[4] <= 100) {
		MaxHitRanged += 17;
			} else if (playerLevel[4] >= 101) {
		MaxHitRanged += 18;
		}
		}
		playerMaxHitRanged = (int)Math.floor(MaxHitRanged);
}

Those are like 99% accurate and, yes the ranged ones took me forever (still incomplete tbh)

don’t ask me why i had the second

		if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		} else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		} else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled
			MaxHit += (Strength + 13)*(E / 10);
		}

I didn’t even notice that until now

item.title: Range Dmg
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“M00 M00 Pk, post:2, topic:170156”]Get people to train range on boards untill they’re lvl 80 range XD

hitDiff = misc.random(30);
Change to;
hitDiff = misc.random(numberHere);

Should work.[/quote]

There hasn’t been any formula released for perfect range max hits… so your gonna have to do what I did and add a max hit for each arrow at each ranged level (yes it takes forever). I was about to post it but i decided not to.

Read full topic

item.title: Range Dmg
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

Ok, my range uses this if(UseBow){ inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; CheckArrows(); CalculateRange(); hitDiff = misc.random(30); }

The hitDiff = misc.random(30);

Can be used in something else? becuz my range hits like 20-30s at like 1-2 range

Read full topic
